name: typescript
description: TypeScript is a **strongly typed, object-oriented, compiled language** that builds on **JavaScript**. Developed and maintained by **Microsoft**, it is often referred to as a **superset of JavaScript**. This means any valid JavaScript code is also valid TypeScript code. However, TypeScript adds powerful features like **static typing**, **interfaces**, **generics**, **enums**, and **advanced tooling support**.
author: Soumadip Banerjee
